name: Beginning HTML
body:
# TwisterJS: Teaching kids to code

This project is managed by [Carmalou](https://github.com/carmalou).
The goal of this project is to expose under-privileged young children to technology. This is being done through apps which will be available to download through the App Store and Google Play.

[TwisterJS](https://github.com/TwisterJS) strives to give opportunity to children who would not otherwise have any. As such, everything here is open source. 

### Please use it to help those in your community.

- Sugar
- Ice cream
- Flour

1. Big Hero Six
2. Despicable Me
3. The Lego Movie
